question:
Consider the following statements about Project HIMANK:
  1. It is a project of Border Roads Organisation (BRO)
  2. It is responsible for construction of roads in Ladakh region of Jammu & Kashmir
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Project HIMANK, is a project of the Border Roads Organisation (BRO) being implemented in the Ladakh region of Jammu & Kashmir. This project started in 1985. Under this project, BRO is responsible for the construction and maintenance of roads and related infrastructure including the world's highest motorable roads across the Khardung La, Tanglang La and Chang La passes. The Project Himank has constructed roads like Khardung La at an altitude of 17,900 ft and Chang La Pass at 17,695 ft in Leh by connecting Nubra valley and Durbuk valley in the cold desert.
